summary.span: 命名空间包含生成 ASP.NET 移动 Web 应用程序所需的核心功能，包括身份验证和错误处理。

span.span: The namespace contains the core capabilities, including authentication and error handling, required for building ASP.NET mobile Web applications.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 www.asp.net/mobile 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供单一源，用于访问有关客户端设备的功能信息和执行设备功能查询。The class provides a single source for accessing capability information about a client device and for performing queries against device capabilities. 类支持无 cookie 设备通过向相应的 Url 追加相应的身份验证信息。The class supports cookieless devices by appending appropriate authentication information to the appropriate URLs.
